comments.html: And we both know that works only for traffic received from outside of VPC ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
You implement service insertion through Ingress Routing. ;)

https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/new-vpc-ingress-routing-simplifying-integration-of-third-party-appliances/

BTW I suspect multicast has made its appearance in conjunction with Local Zones and Outposts, rather than on its own.
comments.name: Dmitri Kalintsev

comments.html: That (Outposts as possible source of multicast support enablement reason) is probably correct. We relied on multicast, when having decided to acquire Outposts.
